root.message: The OTHER_DOC field for indicator 3-7-1, translated into all languages

References

URL:

References:

United Nations, Department of Economic and Social Affairs, Population Division (2020). World Contraceptive Use 2020. See also methodology with technical details available at

(http://www.un.org/en/development/desa/population/publications/dataset/contraception/wcu2020.asp)
